lmΥlm(θ,φ)00Υ00=14π10Υ10=34πcos⁡θ1±1Υ1±1=±38πsin⁡θe±iφ20Υ20=516π(3cos⁡2θ−1)2±1Υ2±1=±158πsin⁡θcos⁡θe±iφ2±2Υ2±2=1532πsin⁡2θe±2iφ\def\arraystretch{2.5} \begin{array}{ccc} \hline l & m & \Upsilon_l^m(\theta, \varphi) \\ \hline 0 & 0 & \Upsilon_0^0 = \frac 1{\sqrt{4\pi}} \\ 1 & 0 & \Upsilon_1^0 = \sqrt{\frac 3{4\pi}}\cos\theta\\ 1 & \pm1 & \Upsilon_1^{\pm1} = \pm\sqrt{\frac 3{8\pi}}\sin\theta e^{\pm i\varphi}\\ 2 & 0 & \Upsilon_2^0 = \sqrt{\frac 5{16\pi}}\left(3\cos^2\theta - 1\right)\\ 2 & \pm1 & \Upsilon_2^{\pm1} = \pm\sqrt{\frac {15}{8\pi}}\sin\theta\cos\theta e^{\pm i\varphi}\\ 2 & \pm2 & \Upsilon_2^{\pm2} = \sqrt{\frac {15}{32\pi}}\sin^2\theta e^{\pm 2i\varphi}\\ \hline \end{array}l011222​m00±10±1±2​Υlm​(θ,φ)Υ00​=4π​1​Υ10​=4π3​​cosθΥ1±1​=±8π3​​sinθe±iφΥ20​=16π5​​(3cos2θ−1)Υ2±1​=±8π15​​sinθcosθe±iφΥ2±2​=32π15​​sin2θe±2iφ​​

Hamiltonoperator för flerelektronsystem

H=∑i=1N(−ℏ22m∇i2−Ze2/4πϵ0ri+∑j>iNe2/4πϵ0rij)\bm H = \sum_{i=1}^N\left(-\frac{\hbar^2}{2m}\nabla_i^2 - \frac{Ze^2/4\pi\epsilon_0}{r_i} + \sum_{j>i}^N\frac{e^2/4\pi\epsilon_0}{r_{ij}}\right)H=i=1∑N​(−2mℏ2​∇i2​−ri​Ze2/4πϵ0​​+j>i∑N​rij​e2/4πϵ0​​)
⟨LML∣l1∣LML⟩=⟨l1⋅L⟩L(L+1)⟨LML∣L∣LML⟩\braket{LM_L|l_1|LM_L} = \frac{\braket{l_1\cdot\bm L}}{L(L + 1)}\braket{LM_L|\bm L|LM_L}⟨LML​∣l1​∣LML​⟩=L(L+1)⟨l1​⋅L⟩​⟨LML​∣L∣LML​⟩

LS-koppling

Termer:{L=∣l1−l2∣,...,l1+l2S=∣s1−s2∣,...,s1+s2\textup{Termer:}\quad \begin{cases} L = |l_1 - l_2|,...,l_1 + l_2 \\ S = |s_1 - s_2|,...,s_1 + s_2 \end{cases}Termer:{L=∣l1​−l2​∣,...,l1​+l2​S=∣s1​−s2​∣,...,s1​+s2​​
Niva˚er:J=∣L−S∣,...,L+S\textup{Nivåer:} \quad J = |L - S|,...,L + SNiva˚er:J=∣L−S∣,...,L+S

EZE={gJμBBMJ(end. finstrktur)gFμBBMF(svagt fa¨lt, hfs)gJμBBMJ+AMIMJ(starkt fa¨lt,  μBB>A)E_{ZE} = \begin{cases} g_J\mu_BBM_J & \textup{(end. finstrktur)} \\ g_F\mu_BBM_F & \textup{(svagt fält, hfs)} \\ g_J\mu_BBM_J + AM_IM_J & \textup{(starkt fält},\; \mu_BB > A) \end{cases}EZE​=⎩⎨⎧​gJ​μB​BMJ​gF​μB​BMF​gJ​μB​BMJ​+AMI​MJ​​(end. finstrktur)(svagt fa¨lt, hfs)(starkt fa¨lt,μB​B>A)​

Integraler

∫0∞xne−αx dx=n!αn+1\int_0^\infty x^ne^{-\alpha x}\: dx = \frac{n!}{\alpha^{n + 1}}∫0∞​xne−αxdx=αn+1n!​
∫0∞x2n+1e−αx2 dx=n!2αn+1\int_0\infty x^{2n + 1}e^{-\alpha x^2}\: dx = \frac{n!}{2\alpha^{n + 1}}∫0​∞x2n+1e−αx2dx=2αn+1n!​
∫0∞e−αx2 dx=12πα\int_0^\infty e^{-\alpha x^2}\: dx = \frac 12\sqrt{\frac{\pi}\alpha}∫0∞​e−αx2dx=21​απ​​
∫0∞x2ne−αx2 dx=(2n−1)!!2(2α)nπα\int_0^\infty x^{2n}e^{-\alpha x^2}\: dx = \frac{(2n - 1)!!}{2(2\alpha)^n}\sqrt{\frac{\pi}{\alpha}}∫0∞​x2ne−αx2dx=2(2α)n(2n−1)!!​απ​​

Dirac notation

<H>=<ψ∣H∣ψ>=∫Rψ∗Hψ dv<\bm H> = <\psi|\bm H|\psi> = \int_{\mathbb{R}} \psi^* \bm H \psi\: dv<H>=<ψ∣H∣ψ>=∫R​ψ∗Hψdv

Kommutatorer

[A,B]=AB−BA[A,B]=−[B,A][A,B+C]=[A,B]+[A,C][AB,C]=A[B,C]+[A,C]B\begin{gathered} [A, B] = AB - BA \\ [A, B] = -[B, A] \\ [A, B + C] = [A, B] + [A, C] \\ [AB, C] = A[B, C] + [A, C]B \end{gathered}[A,B]=AB−BA[A,B]=−[B,A][A,B+C]=[A,B]+[A,C][AB,C]=A[B,C]+[A,C]B​

finstruktur - LShyperfinstruktur - IJva¨xelverkanβL⋅SAI⋅JmomentJ=L+SF=I+Jegentillsta˚nd∣LSJMJ⟩∣IJFMF⟩energiβ/2(J(J+1)−L(L+1)−S(S+1))A/2(F(F+1)−I(I+1)−J(J+1))intervallEJ−EJ−1=βJEF−EF−1=AF(om  ES−O≪Ere)(om  A≫ΔEkvadrupol)\def\arraystretch{1.5} \begin{array}{ccc} \hline & \textup{finstruktur - LS} & \textup{hyperfinstruktur - IJ} \\ \hline \textup{växelverkan} & \beta\bm L\cdot \bm S & A\bm I \cdot\bm J\\ \textup{moment} & \bm J = \bm L + \bm S & \bm F = \bm I + \bm J \\ \textup{egentillstånd} & \ket{LSJM_J} & \ket{IJFM_F} \\ \textup{energi} & \beta/2(J(J + 1) - L(L + 1) - S(S + 1)) & A/2(F(F + 1) - I(I + 1) - J(J + 1))\\ \textup{intervall} & E_J - E_{J - 1} = \beta J & E_F - E_{F - 1} = AF\\ & (\textup{om}\; E_{S-O} \ll E_{re}) & (\textup{om}\; A \gg \Delta E_{kvadrupol}) \\ \hline \end{array}va¨xelverkanmomentegentillsta˚ndenergiintervall​finstruktur - LSβL⋅SJ=L+S∣LSJMJ​⟩β/2(J(J+1)−L(L+1)−S(S+1))EJ​−EJ−1​=βJ(omES−O​≪Ere​)​hyperfinstruktur - IJAI⋅JF=I+J∣IJFMF​⟩A/2(F(F+1)−I(I+1)−J(J+1))EF​−EF−1​=AF(omA≫ΔEkvadrupol​)​​
